H0.text: What city will host the 2016 Olympics. Tokyo

H1.text: What city will host the 2016 Olympics. Madrid

H2.text: What city will host the 2016 Olympics. Doha

H3.text: What city will host the 2016 Olympics. BRRIO

A4.text: The official website for the 2016 Olympics was Rio2016.com

A5.text: On 2 October 2009, the International Olympic Committee selected Rio de Janeiro to host the 2016 Summer Olympics.

A6.text: Rio de Janeiro hosted the 2016 Summer Olympics and Paralympics.
